questions.quote: Maybe, I should call this place and get them to put my 'Days of Our Lives' on here. You know, juice this puppy up a little.
All right look, y'know how-y'know how when you're dating someone and you don't want to cheat on them, unless it's with someone really hot?
I'm supposed to meet and hug a fan whose dying, but that's not supposed to be until later!
Jealous of what? Of your lack of responsiblity? You, your immaturity? Your total disregard of other people's feelings?
Oh, right. Sorry. But Tag's not coming; his girlfriend came into town, so he's spending Thanksgiving with her.
Ok, alright, you guys, you'd better sit down, this is pretty big.
All I ever wanted was just love him and have him love me back. I mean, am I so unlovable?
Hey, so how'd it go with Julie? Did you, did you break her heart?
Well it wasn't my fault, Phoebe was in charge of the invitations!
But I couldn't even if I wanted to, because I don't know! I swear; I didn't see anything, and I don't want to know! It was just a momentary lapse.
